title: Defense Attorney

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a player. You will defend them from having low defense, meaning their defense level will be permanently upgraded by one level (two levels if you have the Necronomicon). With the Necronomicon, targeting a player with this ability will also defend them from living a life with imbalanced stats, dealing an attack to them which treats their defense level as the attack level and their attack level as the defense level, unless they are a member of the Coven. The defense gain effect always resolves before the attack effect.

desc:
Post 1921
*The best offense is a good defense. No, wait...*
